subject: RecursiveTestSuite and reporting
msgSnippet: Currently I am using the ResursiveTestSuite in our build so that any folder I am in I can build a testsuite from that folder and down. this works fine, I am
messageBody:
Currently I am using the ResursiveTestSuite in our build so that any
folder I am in I can build a testsuite from that folder and down. this
works fine, I am using ant build scripts and the <java> task to
execute it, I need to pass in args to set the path.

What I would like todo is generate a report using the
RecursivetestSuite, does anyone have any idea howto do this in ant
script ?
